name: The Curse of Gespinstishspookhaftmeisterblutsauger-burg
description:
You're a lost soul, killed by salmonella poisoning because the local kids egged you and your house. Now, as a ghost, you're out for revenge to haunt the kids who killed you. But watch out for the kids' parents, and the GRAVESKEEPER who won't hesitate to send you back from where you came. Good luck, and happy Halloween!

Made in 48 hours during WolverineSoft's 2022 Pumpkin Game Jam.

Directors: Peter Bagazinski, Ethan Thompson, Saicharan Vemuri

Lead Level Design: Peter Bagazinski

Lead Programmer: Ethan Thompson

Secondary Programmer: Peter Bagazinski, Saicharan Vemuri

Lead Musician: Saicharan Vemuri

Asset Design: Ethan Thompson, Saicharan Vemuri

Special Thanks To:
